headline: Target Expands Beauty Assortment As Store Experience And Leadership Evolve
summary: Target (NYSE:TGT) is launching its largest Spring beauty assortment, adding more than 3,000 mostly budget-friendly products across stores. The retailer is rolling out refreshed in-store beauty layouts, interactive displays, and exclusive events to reshape the shopping experience. Target is also making further leadership changes, including new board members with experience at Nike, Walmart, and HanesBrands. For you as an investor, this move puts a spotlight on beauty as a key category within...
